atk-s0401a11:1_0: 140. Ekādasame vagge adhammaṁ adhammotiādīni vuttanayeneva veditabbāni. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0401a11:4_1: Dvādasame pana anāpattiṁ āpattītiādīsu ‘‘anāpatti ajānantassa atheyyacittassa namaraṇādhippāyassa anullapanādhippāyassa
atk-s0401a11:4_2: namocanādhippāyassā’’ti tattha tattha vuttā anāpatti anāpatti nāma,
atk-s0401a11:4_3: ‘‘jānantassa theyyacittassā’’tiādinā nayena vuttā āpatti āpatti nāma,
